mapper.select:
SELECT M.MARKET_NO,M.MARKET_NAME, M.DISCT_NO, D.DISCT_NAME,M.LAT,M.LNG,M.MARKET_ADDRS,MM.PHONE_NUM,MM.START_TIME,MM.END_TIME,MM.MARKET_MEMBER_NO FROM DISCT D JOIN MARKET M ON D.DISCT_NO=M.DISCT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MARKET_MEMBER MM ON M.MARKET_NO=MM.MARKET_NO WHERE LAT is not null
and M.MARKET_NAME like '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'

SELECT P.PRICES_NO,P.PRICE,P.UPDATE_DATE,P.SELL_STD,P.ITEMS_NO,I.ITEMS_NAME,P.MARKET_NO,MM.MARKET_MEMBER_NO,MM.START_TIME,MM.END_TIME,K.MARKET_NAME,K.DISCT_NAME,K.LAT,K.LNG,P.NOTE,S.SOLDOUT_FLAG FROM ( SELECT PRICES_NO, UPDATE_DATE, MARKET_NO, ITEMS_NO, SELL_STD, NOTE, PRICE, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY MARKET_NO ORDER BY UPDATE_DATE DESC) AS RANK FROM PRICES ) P JOIN ITEMS I ON P.ITEMS_NO = I.ITEMS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT M.MARKET_NO,M.DISCT_NO,D.DISCT_NAME,M.MARKET_NAME,M.LAT,M.LNG FROM MARKET M JOIN DISCT D ON M.DISCT_NO=D.DISCT_NO)K ON P.MARKET_NO=K.MARKET_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MARKET_MEMBER MM ON P.MARKET_NO=MM.MARKET_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN STOCK S ON MM.MARKET_MEMBER_NO=S.MARKET_MEMBER_NO AND P.ITEMS_NO=S.ITEMS_NO WHERE K.LAT is not null AND TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(P.UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= 30 AND RANK = 1 AND P.PRICE!=0
and I.ITEMS_NAME like '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%'
ORDER BY P.PRICE ASC
